name: Critical Widow
description: Critical Widow by Mr. Nice Seeds combines a resinous White Widow hybrid with the heavy-hitting indica Critical Mass. This mostly indica strain rewards growers with high yields of fruity, crystal-packed buds that finish flowering in 7 to 9 weeks.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Euphoric, Relaxed, Focused, Pain, Stress, Depression, Inflammation, Cramps, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
